actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to amend section 802 of the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 and section 244 of the National Housing Act for the purpose of making mandatory the programs established under such sections.
short_title: Co-Insurance and State Housing Finance and Development Agencies Act
subjects: Department of Housing and Urban Development

summary.text: Co-Insurance and State Housing Finance and Development Agencies Act - Makes mandatory the provisions regarding the power of the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to guarantee financial obligations pursuant to the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 and the National Housing Act.

titles.title: Co-Insurance and State Housing Finance and Development Agencies Act

A bill to amend section 802 of the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 and section 244 of the National Housing Act for the purpose of making mandatory the programs established under such sections.
